name: Inferno Strutter
appearance: It sports a natural, translucent obsidian visor over its eyes that looks exactly like a pair of cool 80s aviator sunglasses. It constantly poses sideways.
description: The 'sunglasses' are actually fused keratin shields evolved to protect its eyes from volcanic glare. It spends 90% of its day checking its reflection in magma pools.

special_ability.name: Heat Haze
special_ability.effect: Reduces accuracy of adjacent enemies.

flavor_text: Too cool for school, too hot to touch.

name: Ember-Beak Hatchling
appearance: A tiny chick wearing a discarded baked-bean tin can as a helmet. The can is red-hot and glowing.
description: Small and vulnerable, these hatchlings scavenge human debris to use as armor. This one chose a metal can that cooks its brain slightly, making it perpetually angry.

special_ability.name: Panic Run
special_ability.effect: +50 FP if HP is below 20.

name: Obsidian Juggernaut
appearance: Covered in heavy black rock plates. It has a massive, spiky ball of hardened lava at the end of its tail, resembling a medieval flail.
description: It drags its heavy tail-club along the ground, creating sparks. When threatened, it spins its body to swing the club, demolishing anything behind it.

special_ability.name: Molten Armor
special_ability.effect: Takes -10 damage from physical attacks.

name: Turbo-Vent Dancer
appearance: Has two large, tubular exhaust pipes protruding from its shoulder blades that puff out rhythmic smoke rings in time with its dancing.
description: The biological exhaust pipes vent excess heat. By constricting its muscles, it can shoot jets of steam from its back to boost its dance speed.

special_ability.name: Spinning Kick
special_ability.effect: Deals damage to all adjacent squares.

flavor_text: Dance like your back is exploding.

name: Mortar-Back Sniper
appearance: It has a literal, fleshy cannon growing out of its spine. It has to kneel down on its front legs to aim the barrel.
description: A terrifying mutation where the esophagus loops over the shoulder to form a biological mortar. It swallows rocks and spits them out of its back at supersonic speeds.

special_ability.name: Smoke Screen
special_ability.effect: Cannot be targeted by ranged attacks.

name: Furnace-Belly Glutton
appearance: Its stomach has a transparent window of hardened skin, revealing a raging fire burning inside. It holds a rusty shovel in its beak.
description: It uses the shovel to scoop coal directly into its mouth. The window allows flock-mates to see if it needs more fuel.

special_ability.name: Stoke
special_ability.effect: Sacrifice 10 HP to gain +30 FP for one turn.

name: Solar-Crest Seraph
appearance: It has six wings made of pure fire and a glowing halo hovering above its head. It floats slightly off the ground.
description: It has transcended birdhood. The halo is actually a ring of super-heated gas held in place by magnetic fields generated by its brain.

special_ability.name: Supernova
special_ability.effect: On death, deals 100 damage to everyone on the board.

flavor_text: Be not afraid. Actually, be very afraid.

name: Scuba-Steve
appearance: It wears a snorkel mask made of sea-glass and kelp, and has flippers on its feet that look suspiciously like plastic swimming gear.
description: This bird scavenges tourist beaches for gear. It has forgotten how to breathe underwater naturally and relies entirely on the snorkel.

special_ability.name: Dampen
special_ability.effect: Extinguishes Fire type status effects on allies.

flavor_text: He's just happy to be here.

name: Hydra-Siphon
appearance: It has three separate heads on three long, writhing necks. The heads constantly argue and bite each other.
description: A polycephalic mutation common in the deep trenches. The left head eats, the right head breathes, and the middle head just screams.

special_ability.name: Liquid Form
special_ability.effect: Can move through enemy units.

flavor_text: Three heads are louder than one.

name: Reef-Shield Paladin
appearance: It carries a massive, calcified Giant Clam shell on one wing like a riot shield, and wields a swordfish bill in the other wing.
description: It trains in the martial arts of the coral reef. The shield is heavy, but blocks almost any attack.

special_ability.name: Bleed
special_ability.effect: Attacks cause 10 damage per turn for 3 turns.

name: Cryo-Skipper
appearance: Its feet have evolved into long, flat blades resembling ice skates. It wears a scarf made of molted feathers.
description: It skates across frozen lakes at high speeds. The scarf is a fashion choice, not a biological necessity.

special_ability.name: Permafrost
special_ability.effect: Target cannot move next turn.

flavor_text: Doing a triple axel into your face.

name: Torpedo-Rider
appearance: It has a large, spinning propeller growing out of its tail feathers. It looks like a living motorboat.
description: The propeller is made of keratin and spins via muscle spasms. It makes a loud 'putt-putt-putt' noise when swimming.

special_ability.name: Crash
special_ability.effect: Push the enemy back 1 square after attacking.

name: Bazooka-Blower
appearance: Its beak is absurdly wide and cylindrical, resembling a rocket launcher barrel. It chews pink bubblegum constantly.
description: It fires hardened balls of bubble-resin from its tube-beak with enough force to knock a coconut off a tree.

special_ability.name: Trap Bubble
special_ability.effect: Reduces enemy speed/evasion.

name: Leviathan Lord
appearance: It is enormous and has tentacles instead of wings. A small ship anchor is tangled in its legs.
description: A monstrosity of the deep. It uses the tentacles to grapple prey and the anchor as a melee weapon.

special_ability.name: Eruption
special_ability.effect: Transforms all Water tiles into Scalding Water (Damage over time).

name: Sniper-Bush Mimic
appearance: It wears a full military-style Ghillie suit made of living vines and leaves. You can only see its beak protruding.
description: It takes camouflage too seriously. It will stand perfectly still for weeks, even if birds build nests on its head.

special_ability.name: Photosynthesis
special_ability.effect: Regenerate 10 HP per turn.

name: Gnome-Rider Sentinel
appearance: A garden gnome is permanently fused to its back, wielding a tiny fishing rod. The gnome's eyes follow you.
description: A parasitic relationship where a garden gnome fungus has taken over the bird's nervous system. The gnome is the one driving.

special_ability.name: Hardening
special_ability.effect: Takes 50% less damage from Electric attacks.

name: Briar-Whip Dominator
appearance: It wears a corset made of thorns and holds a long, thorny vine in its beak like a whip.
description: It uses the vine whip to discipline unruly flock members. It has a very commanding presence.

special_ability.name: Thorns
special_ability.effect: Enemies take 15 damage when attacking this unit.

name: Siege-Tower Host
appearance: A functional wooden catapult has been built on its back by industrious squirrels. The squirrels operate it during battle.
description: The bird provides transport; the squirrels provide artillery support (throwing acorns and rocks).

special_ability.name: Camouflage
special_ability.effect: Invisible if standing on Grass terrain.

name: Cactus-Spike Punk
appearance: It has a bright green mohawk made of cactus spines and wears a leather jacket made of dried kelp.
description: The rebellious teenager of the flock. It shoots needles from its mohawk when it headbangs.

special_ability.name: Needle Spray
special_ability.effect: Attack hits a cone area of 3 squares.

name: Spider-Mingo
appearance: It has eight legs. Six of them are useless and dangle from its chest, but it looks absolutely horrifying.
description: A mutation that serves no purpose other than to terrify arachnophobes. It can run on walls, theoretically, but prefers not to.

special_ability.name: Entangle
special_ability.effect: Enemy loses -20 FP for one turn.

flavor_text: Why does it need so many knees?

name: Two-Headed Trap-Mingo
appearance: One head is a flamingo, the other head is a giant Venus Flytrap. They look like they are on a date.
description: The plant head does the eating; the bird head does the navigating. They often share jokes.

special_ability.name: Devour
special_ability.effect: Instantly kills any unit with under 30 HP and heals self.

name: Cyber-Visor Dancer
appearance: It wears a sleek, glowing LED visor over its eyes (Daft Punk style) and has neon tubes running along its legs.
description: It generates sick beats and high voltage. The visor displays its current mood: usually 'Angry' or 'Vibing'.

special_ability.name: Chain Lightning
special_ability.effect: Damage jumps to a second target.

name: Battery-Pack Mule
appearance: It carries a massive Duracell-style battery strapped to its back with duct tape. Wires clip onto its ear-holes.
description: It's not actually generating electricity; it's just hauling a AA battery it found. It zaps people with jumper cables.

special_ability.name: Recharge
special_ability.effect: Give +20 FP to an adjacent ally.

name: Satellite-Dish Conduit
appearance: Instead of a head, it has a rotating radar dish. The beak sticks out of the middle of the dish.
description: It can receive AM/FM radio and encrypted military signals. It fires lightning bolts whenever a bass drops.

special_ability.name: Overload
special_ability.effect: Deals double damage to Water types.

name: Rocket-Boot Chick
appearance: It has no feet, only jets of blue flame where its feet should be. It hovers inches off the ground.
description: It moves via constant explosive propulsion. It cannot land. It sleeps hovering.

special_ability.name: Jitter
special_ability.effect: 50% chance to dodge attacks.

flavor_text: Zero to sixty in one squawk.

name: Mech-Walker Wader
appearance: Its legs have been replaced by hydraulic pistons. It makes a mechanical 'whir-clank' sound when it walks.
description: A cyborg flamingo that upgraded its legs for maximum stability. It never skips leg day.

special_ability.name: Attract
special_ability.effect: Pulls an enemy unit 1 tile closer.

name: Storm-Caller Wizard
appearance: It holds a twisted metal rod (lightning rod) in one claw like a wizard staff and wears a pointy hat made of sheet metal.
description: It thinks it's a wizard. It summons lightning by pointing the rod at things and screaming.

special_ability.name: Thunderclap
special_ability.effect: Stuns enemies for 1 turn on critical hits.

name: Brain-Jar Alpha
appearance: Its skull is a transparent glass dome containing a glowing, pulsing brain floating in green liquid.
description: Its psychic powers are immense. It can levitate shrimp directly into its mouth without moving.

special_ability.name: Synapse Break
special_ability.effect: Attacks never miss.

name: Disco-Ball Mimic
appearance: Covered in small, square mirrors. It spins slowly, reflecting light everywhere.
description: It dazzles predators with funk. When the sun hits it, it blinds everyone within a 10-mile radius.

special_ability.name: Illusion
special_ability.effect: Creates a clone with 1 HP.

name: The Monopod King
appearance: It stands on one massive, muscular leg that wears a golden greave. It wears a crown that is slightly too big and slips over its eyes.
description: The King needs only one leg to rule them all. The crown was stolen from a museum gift shop.

special_ability.name: Eternal Balance
special_ability.effect: Cannot be Toppled. Always has Poised bonus.

name: Cotton-Puff Strutter
appearance: It is literally just a ball of pink spun sugar on two paper sticks. It gets smaller when it rains.
description: Sticky to the touch and incredibly light. It floats away in strong breezes and gets stuck to telephone poles.

special_ability.name: Sugar Rush
special_ability.effect: +50 Speed for the first 2 turns.

flavor_text: Dissolves in water. Do not swim.

name: Jawbreaker Golem
appearance: A solid, spherical bird made of 500 layers of hard candy. It has no neck, just a head fused to the body.
description: It is nearly indestructible. Weapons shatter against its shell. It takes 40 years to lick your way to the center.

special_ability.name: Hard Shell
special_ability.effect: Immune to Critical Hits.

name: Gummy-Worm Wader
appearance: Translucent, neon green, and jiggly. Its neck is one long, stretchy sour worm coated in sugar dust.
description: Physical attacks simply bounce off its rubbery hide. It can stretch its neck 10x its normal length to steal snacks.

special_ability.name: Elasticity
special_ability.effect: Takes 50% less damage from physical melee attacks.

name: Fondue Baron
appearance: Constantly oozing molten chocolate from under its wings. It wears a monocle made of a marshmallow.
description: It lives in a perpetual state of melting. Anything it touches is instantly covered in a delicious, hardening shell.

special_ability.name: Sticky Trap
special_ability.effect: Enemies that attack this unit lose -1 movement next turn.

name: Cane-Leg Kicker
appearance: Its legs and neck are sharpened peppermint sticks. It smells aggressively of Christmas.
description: Its limbs are brittle but razor sharp. It fights by snapping off pieces of its own body and throwing them as shivs.

special_ability.name: Minty Fresh
special_ability.effect: Freezes enemies on contact (Stun 1 turn).

name: Snack-Dispenser Cyborg
appearance: A rectangular vending machine with bird legs. It shoots soda cans out of the collection slot at high velocity.
description: It requires quarters to operate. Sometimes the soda cans get stuck and you have to shake the bird violently.

special_ability.name: Caffeine Crash
special_ability.effect: Deals massive damage, but sleeps the next turn.

name: Licorice Banshee
appearance: Made of twisted black ropes of licorice. It looks like a tangled mess of cables.
description: Nobody likes this bird. It is bitter, tough, and stays in your teeth for days. It feeds on disappointment.

special_ability.name: Acquired Taste
special_ability.effect: Enemies avoid targeting this unit if possible.

name: Pop-Rock Popper
appearance: It vibrates constantly and makes a loud sizzling noise. Smoke rises from its feathers.
description: A volatile bird composed of pressurized carbonated candy. If it drinks soda, it explodes.

special_ability.name: Detonate
special_ability.effect: Deals 30 damage to self and 100 to enemy.

name: The Patisserie Archon
appearance: A three-tiered wedding cake with legs. It has lit candles for eyes and shoots frosting from a piping bag canon on its back.
description: The ruler of the Sugar Isles. Slicing it open reveals it is actually red velvet sponge cake inside.

special_ability.name: Diabetes
special_ability.effect: Slows all enemies by 50% permanently.

name: Gingerbread Juggernaut
appearance: A flat, 2D cookie bird with gumdrop buttons. One leg has already been bitten off.
description: Baked at high temperatures, it is as hard as a brick. It hates milk.

special_ability.name: Crumble
special_ability.effect: On death, spawns 2 smaller Cookie Chicks.

flavor_text: Run, run, as fast as you can.

name: Low-Budget Haunter
appearance: A regular flamingo wearing a white bedsheet with two crudely cut eyeholes. You can see its pink legs sticking out the bottom.
description: It tries very hard to be scary. It says 'Woooo' but mostly just sounds like a bird choking.

special_ability.name: Boo!
special_ability.effect: 10% chance to stun enemy out of sheer confusion.

name: Ossified Oracle
appearance: A complete skeleton held together by spectral blue energy. Its ribcage acts as a cage for a trapped soul (a smaller bird).
description: It rattles loudly when it walks. It throws its own ribs like boomerangs.

special_ability.name: Reassemble
special_ability.effect: Revives with 50% HP once per game.

name: Chain-Gang Drifter
appearance: Wrapped in heavy, rusty chains that float in the air. It drags a cartoonishly large iron ball attached to its ankle.
description: Bound to the earth by its crimes (eating too much shrimp). It swings the iron ball to crush foes.

special_ability.name: Shackle
special_ability.effect: Prevents enemy from retreating.

name: The Dullahan Dancer
appearance: It has no head on its neck. It carries its severed head tucked under its wing like a football. The head is still squawking.
description: Since its eyes are under its wing, it constantly bumps into furniture. It breathes green fire from the severed neck stump.

special_ability.name: Head Toss
special_ability.effect: Throws head to any square (Neck Reach becomes Infinite).

name: Graveyard Shift
appearance: It's literally just a granite tombstone with bird legs. The engraving reads 'HERE LIES FLAMINGO'.
description: It sleeps during the day and works at night. It is incredibly heavy and depressing to be around.

special_ability.name: Burial
special_ability.effect: Digs a hole and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Polter-Geist Peck
appearance: Invisible except for a floating pair of aggressive sunglasses and a beak. Objects fly around it in a whirlwind.
description: A chaotic spirit that loves to knock vases off shelves. It attacks by telekinetically throwing furniture.

special_ability.name: Telekinesis
special_ability.effect: Uses the opponent's stats against them.

name: Count Flami-cula
appearance: Pale white skin, slicked-back feathers, and a high-collared cape. It holds a glass of 'tomato juice' (It's blood).
description: It speaks with a terrible Transylvanian accent. It turns into a bat, but the bat still has long pink legs so it looks ridiculous.

special_ability.name: Life Drain
special_ability.effect: Heals for 50% of damage dealt.

name: Ecto-Slime Sovereign
appearance: Made entirely of glowing green goo. It holds a proton pack it stole from a ghost hunter.
description: If you hug it, you will need a shower. It leaves a trail of slime that makes people slip and fall.

special_ability.name: Slimed
special_ability.effect: Enemy accuracy reduced by 30%.

name: The Possessed Lawn Ornament
appearance: A faded pink plastic flamingo with red glowing eyes and a crack in its skull. It holds a rusty knife.
description: A cheap plastic decoration filled with ancient malice. It only moves when you aren't looking at it.

special_ability.name: Jump Scare
special_ability.effect: Teleports behind the enemy.

name: The Pale Rider
appearance: A skeletal bird in a black hooded robe. It rides a tiny skeletal horse. It wields a scythe in its beak.
description: The bringer of the end times. The horse is struggling to support the bird's weight.

special_ability.name: Reap
special_ability.effect: Instantly kills enemies with under 20% HP.

name: The Unpaid Intern
appearance: It looks exhausted and is holding four scorching hot coffees in its wings. It has dark circles under its eyes.
description: It has no actual skills but is doing its best. It functions purely on caffeine and the fear of disappointment.

special_ability.name: Coffee Run
special_ability.effect: Transfer 20 FP to a higher rarity ally.

flavor_text: Experience is its own reward (they said).

name: Middle-Manager Mingo
appearance: Wears a cheap, ill-fitting grey suit and a tie that is too short. Its feathers are balding in a combover pattern.
description: It calls unnecessary meetings to justify its existence. It specializes in micromanaging younger birds.

special_ability.name: Meeting Adjourned
special_ability.effect: Stuns all units (friend and foe) for 1 turn due to boredom.

flavor_text: Let's circle back to that offline.

name: IT Support Strutter
appearance: Entangled in a massive ball of ethernet cables. It wears a headset and is actively eating a bag of chips.
description: It lives in the server room (the basement). It solves problems by turning the universe off and on again.

special_ability.name: Reboot
special_ability.effect: Resets an enemy's stats to their base values.

name: HR Representative
appearance: It has a forced, terrifyingly polite smile frozen on its beak. It holds a clipboard and a pen.
description: It appears friendly but is actually calculating how to fire you without a lawsuit. Its gaze drains your will to fight.

special_ability.name: Compliance
special_ability.effect: Enemy cannot attack next turn (sent to sensitivity training).

name: The Golden CEO
appearance: It is morbidly obese and covered in gold leaf. It smokes a cigar made of rolled-up $100 bills.
description: It doesn't actually fight; it pays other people to fight for it. It has a golden parachute (literally) strapped to its back.

special_ability.name: Layoffs
special_ability.effect: Sacrifice a Common ally to fully heal self.

name: Void-Neck Watcher
appearance: Its body is normal, but its neck is a portal to deep space. You can see stars twinkling inside its throat.
description: It eats by sucking matter into the vacuum of its esophagus. It doesn't squawk; it emits low-frequency radio waves.

special_ability.name: Vacuum
special_ability.effect: Pulls all enemies 1 tile closer.

flavor_text: In space, no one can hear you honk.

name: Grey Alien Abductor
appearance: It has huge black almond-shaped eyes and grey skin. It hovers inside a tiny flying saucer that barely fits its legs.
description: It visits farms at night to confuse cows. It is searching for intelligent life, but found only shrimp.

special_ability.name: Tractor Beam
special_ability.effect: Lift an enemy into the air (cannot be hit by Melee) for 1 turn.

name: Meteorite Crasher
appearance: It's just a rock with legs. It is burning up upon re-entry. It is screaming.
description: It fell from the sky at Mach 10. It is incredibly dense and creates a crater wherever it stands.

special_ability.name: Impact
special_ability.effect: Deals splash damage to all adjacent units upon summoning.

name: Nebula Drifter
appearance: Made entirely of purple and blue gas clouds. Small planets orbit its head like flies.
description: A sentient gas cloud that formed into the shape of a bird for tax reasons. Physical attacks pass right through it.

special_ability.name: Gamma Ray
special_ability.effect: Attacks ignore armor/defense stats.

name: Event Horizon Lord
appearance: A Vantablack silhouette. Light physically bends around it. Time slows down when you look at it.
description: A living black hole. If it eats a shrimp, that shrimp is erased from history entirely.

special_ability.name: Singularity
special_ability.effect: Instantly kills the unit with the highest HP on the board (once per game).
